document_data.mainbody:
helgul was an author on or before the 14 century DR.
By , Thelguls work Do Metals Live? was amongst the works in Candlekeep.
In 1373, Noumea Cardellith, pretending to be a merchant from Lantan, claimed to be interested in Thelguls Do Metals Live? when seeking admittance in Candlekeep.
